text:
It seems that when the length of the word to split is above a certain number of 
characters, FOP crashes and does not create any output.
I used the following stle sheet to set hyphenation

<fo:block   language="en"             			
            hyphenate="true"
            hyphenation-push-character-count="2"
            hyphenation-remain-character-count="2">...

When the word to split is smaller than the limit size, hyphenation works OK
creator: Laurent.Galafassi@crealogix.com
